"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5413d2cd63687216202a0100#post_5413d2cd63687216202a0100
True story: A guy I knew in Afghanistan got slapped with an Article 15 (the basic official disciplinary action) for a negligent discharge because he freaked out and shot at a camel spider that seemed to be chasing him. (in reality camel spiders are not chasing you, they're chasing the shade you cast.)
